summary.span: 为所有 元素提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all elements.

summary.span: 使用 元素放置和排列 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的子对象。

span.span: Use elements to position and arrange child objects in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含对象的集合 ，这些对象位于 属性中。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 向添加的 子将 隐式添加到 元素的 。Adding a child to a implicitly adds it to the for the element. WPF 提供了一套全面的派生 实现，从而实现了很多复杂的布局。WPF provides a comprehensive suite of derived implementations, enabling many complex layouts. 如果要实现新的布局容器，请使用 和 方法。If you want to implement new layout containers, use the and methods. 有关如何使用这些方法的演示，请参阅 [创建自定义内容换行面板示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)。For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979). 如果未定义，元素不会接收鼠标或触笔事件 。 elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a is not defined. 如果需要处理鼠标或触笔事件，但不希望 使用背景，请使用 。If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your , use . 默认情况下，Panel 元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制 panel 元素以接收焦点，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性将两个对象添加 到 中。The following example shows how to use the property to add two objects to a . [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/StackPanelExample.xaml#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/CSharp/StackpanelExample.cs#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/stackpanelexample.vb#stackpanelexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将数据绑定到此属性。You cannot bind data to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例使用 创建水平 。The following example uses a to create a horizontal . 水平在 中指定 。The horizontal is specified within the . 在 上，属性设置为 `true` ，指示生成的项应放置在面板中。The property is set to `true` on the , which indicates that the generated items should be placed in the panel. 如果以这种方式指定此方法，则 不能在不使用的情况下由控件的用户替换 。When you specify it this way, the cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a . 因此，仅当你知道不需要使用模板来替换面板时，才执行此操作。Therefore, do this only if you know that you do not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，可以设置 属性。Alternatively, you can set the property. 下面的示例设置的 中的 。The following example sets the in a of a . summary.span: 设置给定元素的 附加属性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property for a given element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定的越大 `value` `element` ，最有可能 `element` 出现在前台。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同样，如果的数量 `element` 相对较低 `value` ，则 `element` 可能会在背景中出现。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如， `element` 具有 `value` 5 的的将显示在其上为4的， `element` `value` 后者将显示在值为3的上方， `element` 依此类推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允许使用负值，并继续使用此优先级模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 具有相等值的集合的成员 将按照它们在可视化树中出现的顺序呈现。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 通过循环访问集合的成员，可以确定子级的索引位置 。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用) 的方法来设置属性 (的值 。The following example demonstrates in code how to set the value of the property (by using the method). [!code-cpp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/CPP/CanvasZ-Order.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/Csharp/CanvasZ-Order.cs#2)] [!code-vb[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/VisualBasic/CanvasZ-Order.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定的越大 `value` `element` ，最有可能 `element` 出现在前台。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同样，如果的数量 `element` 相对较低 `value` ，则 `element` 可能会在背景中出现。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如， `element` 具有 `value` 5 的的将显示在其上为4的， `element` `value` 后者将显示在值为3的上方， `element` 依此类推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允许使用负值，并继续使用此优先级模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 具有相等值的集合的成员 将按照它们在可视化树中出现的顺序呈现。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 通过循环访问集合的成员，可以确定子级的索引位置 。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 和代码设置属性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property by using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) and code.
